name: Naomi Carrigan
bio: Founder of Becca Lyria, Discord bot

milestones.title: Started development on Rosalia
milestones.description: Began development on the beta version of Rosalia Nightsong, a new Discord bot.

milestones.title: Began working at freeCodeCamp
milestones.description: Began working as a developer for freeCodeCamp, a non-profit organisation that provides free curricula and content for people learning to code.

milestones.title: Started development on Becca
milestones.description: Began development on Becca Lyria, a community management and moderation bot for Discord.

milestones.title: Learning to Code!
milestones.description: Started learning to code with the freeCodeCamp curriculum!
